job_details.Vacaturetitel: Work from Home Senior Developer Mentor
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by…
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
       Examples of desirable expertise
job_details.full_text:
Work from Home Senior Developer Mentor

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by…
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
       Examples of desirable expertise

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using coding expertise to train AI models through feedback and evaluation, rather than developing or engineering AI systems. It lacks the core responsibilities and technologies associated with ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer roles.

job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the process of training machine learning models, which is a core component of the Modeling task category.
This explicitly mentions training generative AI models, fitting directly into the Modeling task category, especially concerning generative techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
job_tasks.justification: This describes a method of providing data and feedback to train AI models, which falls under the broader scope of the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and ranking model outputs is a crucial part of the model training and fine-tuning process, thus aligning with the Modeling task.

soft_skills.phrase: no requirement for previous AI experience
soft_skills.justification: This indicates that the role is open to individuals who may not have prior AI experience, suggesting a need for learning and adaptability to acquire the necessary skills on the job.

soft_skills.phrase: lend your coding expertise to train AI models
soft_skills.justification: This implies taking ownership of a specific contribution (lending expertise) towards a larger goal (training AI models), suggesting a proactive and responsible approach.
